messages.title: Working Hard for Leicester South
messages.content: Raising issues that matter to you 63 questions in Parliament. Helping with your problems Helped over 5,500 people. Listening to you Over 400 letters and 1,500 emails received weekly. Responding to you In the top 5% of MPs for quick response to letters and emails (source: theyworkforyou.com). Peter’s Promise For The Future 'To work as hard for you and Leicester South as I have always done'.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Funded 89,000 extra nurses and 44,000 extra doctors since 1997. Guaranteed access to a cancer specialist within 2 weeks of GP referral.
Provided more teachers and classroom assistants to cut class sizes.

issues.education: Provided more teachers and classroom assistants to cut class sizes.
issues.health: Funded 89,000 extra nurses and 44,000 extra doctors since 1997. Guaranteed access to a cancer specialist within 2 weeks of GP referral.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have served you as a hard working, local MP for over four years - speaking out for Leicester South' 'And I will continue to do so if I'm re-elected' 'I have been available throughout the Constituency and I am in the top 5% of MPs for quick responses to letters and emails' 'I have never 'flipped houses' and have not been asked to pay back a single penny of my expenses' Peter

contactInformation.address: Peter Soulsby Campaign, 1 New Street, Leicester, LE1 5NR

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Labour Government provides real help for our community. Do not risk this real help.
